content: मुच् {vI.v} {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> (मोचते) To deceive, cheat; see मुंच् {vII.v} {c6c} <ab>U.</ab> (मुंचति-ते, मुमोच-पुमुचे, अमुचत्-अमुक्त, मोक्ष्यति-ते, मोक्तं, मुक्त) {@--1@} To loose set free, release, let go, let loose, liberate, deliver (from captivity &c.); वनाय… यशोधनो धेनुमृषेर्मुमोच <ls>R. 2. 1</ls>, <ls n="R.">3. 20</ls>; <ls>Ms. 8. 202</ls>; मोक्ष्यते मुरबदीनां वेणीर्विर्यविभूतिभिः <ls>Ku. 2. 61</ls>; <ls>R. 10. 47</ls>; मा भवानगानि मुंचतु <ls>V. 2</ls> ‘let not thy limbs droop’, ‘do not despond’. {@--2@} To set free, loosen (as the voice); कंठं मुंचति बर्हिणः समदनः <ls>Mk. 5. 14</ls> ‘loosens his throat or voice’ {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} raises a cry. {@--3@} To leave, abandon, quit, give up, lay aside, relinquish; रात्रिर्गता मतिमतां वर मुंच शय्यां <ls>R. 5. 66</ls>; मुच मयि मानमनिदानं <ls>Gīt. 10</ls>; मुक्तिसुताप्रणयस्मृतिरोधिना मम च मुक्तमिदं तमसा मनः <ls>Ś. 6. 7</ls>; मौनं मुंर्चात किं च कैरवकुले <ls>Bv. 1. 4</ls>; आविर्भूते शशिनि तमसा मुच्यमानेव रात्रिः <ls>V. 1. 8</ls>; <ls>Me. 96</ls>, <ls n="Me.">41</ls>; <ls>R. 3. 11.</ls> {@--4@} To set apart, take away, except, see मुक्त्वा. {@--5@} To dismiss, send away. {@--6@} To cast throw, hurl, fling, discharge; मृगेषु शरान् मुमुक्षोः <ls>R. 9. 58</ls>: <ls>Bk. 15. 53.</ls> {@--7@} To emit, drop, pour forth or down, shed, let fall (tears &c.) अपसृतपांडुपत्रा मुंचंत्यश्रूणीव लताः <ls>Ś. 4. 11</ls>; चिरविरहजं मुंचतो बाष्पमुष्णं <ls>Me. 12</ls>; स शरवृष्टिमुचा धनुषा <ls>R. 9. 12</ls>, <ls>Bk. 7. 2.</ls> {@--8@} To utter, give forth; <ls>Māl. 9. 5</ls>; <ls>Bk. 7. 57.</ls> {@--9@} To give away, grant, bestow. {@--10@} To put on (<ab>A.</ab>). {@--11@} To void (as excrement). {@--12@} To sacrifice. {%--<ab>Pass.</ab>%} (मुच्यते) {@--1@} To be loosed or released, be freed or absolved from (with <ab>abl.</ab> or <ab>instr.</ab>); मुच्यते सर्वपापेभ्यः &c. {@--2@} To become loose or relaxed. {@--3@} To free oneself, escape. {@--4@} To abandon, deviate or swerve from. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (मोचयति-ते) {@--1@} To cause to be freed or liberated. {@--2@} To cause to shed. {@--3@} To loose, set at liberty, liberate. {@--4@} To extricate, disentangle. {@--5@} To unyoke, unharness. {@--6@} To give away, bestow. {@--7@} To gladden, delight. {@--8@} To open (a road). {@--9@} To redeem from. {%--<ab>Desid.</ab>%} (मुमुक्षति) {@--1@} To wish to free or liberate &c. {@--2@} (मुमुक्षते, मोक्षते) To long for final emancipation.
मुच् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (An the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) {@--1@} Freeing, liberating, delivering from. {@--2@} Discharging, throwing, sending, emitting. {@--3@} Giving up, leaving &c.
